posts.name: Jessica Smith
posts.cooked:
Welcome to the Weekly Roundup!

3/14/22 - 3/20/22
Issue - V94
Current Release: 1.8.0

Every week we’ll share community-driven apps and articles that were shared with us during the previous week as well as any major announcements from Streamlit. If there is anything we missed feel free to add it in a comment or @ us on Twitter!

  • = articles
  • = videos
  • = apps

Streamlit Updates

  • Version 1.8.0 was released.

Featured Content

  • Rascore @mitch-parker
  • Fidelity Account Overview @gerardrbentley
  • Auto-generating meeting notes with Python

Tutorials/Introduction

  • How to Build a Real-Time Transcription Web App in Python using AssemblyAI and Streamlit @dataprofessor
  • Using STREAMLIT with AG Grid Table - Interactive Table | Part 2/2 @avratanubiswas
  • Mirror Your Text Streamlit App (Upside Down Clone) @jesse_jcharis
  • Streamlit to be acquired by Snowflake for 800M$ ! @andfanilo
  • Build and deploy an ML app with Streamlit in 9 super short steps
  • Carga, descarga y manipulación de datos con Streamlit
  • Some More Text Elements Of Streamlit | Complete Streamlit Python Course | Streamlit Tutorial 4
  • Display Elements Of Streamlit | Complete Streamlit Python Course | Streamlit Tutorial 5
  • Media Widgets of Streamlit | Complete Streamlit Python Course | Streamlit Tutorial 6
  • Hands-on Lab: Music analytics app in python with Streamlit and Spotify
  • Data Viz Dashboard using StreamLit
  • How to create a Streamlit app in VS Code
  • Image Classification using SingleStoreDB, Keras and Tensorflow
  • Streamlit 中文入门教学 - 文件下载功能
  • Streamlit 中文入门教学 - 编写一个表单
  • Streamlit 中文入门教学 - 分列显示内容
  • Streamlit 中文入门教学 - 单页面状态数据
  • Streamlit 中文入门教学 - 多页面状态数据
  • Streamlit 中文入门教学 - 打包 Docker 容器镜像 - 操作教学
  • Incorporating Functions with HTML Output in Streamlit (pyLDAvis, Lime)
  • Optimization with Python-doCplex- Beginners Guide (Streamlit Application)
  • 文章要約アプリ【streamlit】

Science and Tech

  • Combined Cycle Power Plant Energy Prediciton
  • Kalkulator Indeks Keragaman dan Indeks Nilai Penting
  • Properties of Steel Deck in Bending Predicted by Support Vector Machine (SVM)
  • Prevendo ocorrência de doenças cardio vasculares

NLP and Language

  • Fake News Model
  • Tweet Scraper
  • Vaccine Misinformation Detection
  • streamlit local

Data Visualization

  • Visualization with annotation
  • Whatsapp Analyzer

CV and Images

  • Attendance Project
  • IMAGE2PIXELART
  • GANdy Warhol
  • Cat Prediction App
  • st_ipython_reader @andfanilo
  • st_crop_image @andfanilo
  • face recognition dengan web interface menggunakan streamlit | python tutorial #22

Sports

  • Le Système de Recommandation de Footballeurs

Finance and Business

  • Real Estate App for a Retail Business
  • Roommate Expense Tracker: visualize and maintain spending habits @gerardrbentley
  • College Cost Analysis
  • Multi-feature Portfolio Optimizer App (MPOA)
  • Stock Market Price Prediction
  • Software Developer Salary Prediction
  • Industry Screening
  • Streamlit & Python Data Science Web App
  • Machine learning Salary prediction #ML #python #streamlit

Geography and Society

  • Cyclists Forecast Berlin
  • Embed an interactive split-panel map in a website or Streamlit web app @giswqs
  • Aplicación web con Streamlit

General

  • ShopLit @Brydon_Parker
  • Jupyterlite in Streamlit @charly_wargnier
  • Movie Recommendation
  • Site Energy Intensity Prediction Application
  • Accident Severity Prediction Application
  • Moodle Downloader
  • Streamlit App for Exploratory Data Analysis
  • 画像やグラフ、地図の表示 ～ Streamlit
  • 【Streamlit】Pythonで簡単Webアプリ作成

Cool happenings and other things

  • Pablo Fonseca Interview - Streamlit AG Grid Component @PablocFonseca
  • Build your Own Data and Machine Learning Apps in Minutes with Streamlit 1 In person workshop 3/26 @arnaudmiribel
  • Barfi : Flow Based Programming for Data Science (New Component) @krishadi
  • Streamlit-shap - A static component to display SHAP plots in Streamlit @snehankekre
  • streamlit-d3graph @snehankekre
  • FirstLanguage component

Follow us

  • Twitter
